fields.description:
Ti.SafariDialog has too much padding on top when hangout or hotspot is activating.

Check this screenshot
!https://d17oy1vhnax1f7.cloudfront.net/items/162Z3o3u061T3N2p0T3q/IMG_9147.PNG?v=09e1ef6b!

https://cl.ly/1k2C340m2Y3T

:)
fields.summary: Ti.SafariDialog has too much padding on top when hangout or hotspot is activating.

comments.body: Pretty sure that's a native issue. Can you file an [Apple bugreport|http://bugreport.apple.com] for this please? And did you see a difference between iOS 9 and iOS 10?
Closing as "not our bug". If you disagree, please reopen.
